title: School Idols are Greedy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Shi-o-ri-ko-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>What is it, Honoka-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I saw your live the other day! Your performance was really great, Shioriko-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>T-, thank you very much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>So so, I have some things I want you to teach me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Me…. teaching you? Is there anything that I, who just started as a school idol recently, could teach you about, Honoka-san….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh, there is! Besides, it doesn’t matter when you started. You see, I want to know a lot more about various things, I want to know everything that interests me! Right now, I want to know all of your good points, Shioriko-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Honoka-san….! Then, I also have a lot of things I want to ask you about, Honoka-san. If you don’t mind, may we teach each other?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course! So, umm, I’ve made a list of everything I wanted to ask! Alright, here it is♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>T-, this many!? You wanted to ask this many questions!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
